name: milk evaporation | evaporation of milk | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11841/documentation

The functional unit is 1  kg water evaporated. This module is based on literature from milk processing equipment manufacturer and should be used when evaluating evaporation of water from raw (or skimmed) milk to produce evaporated milk. Basic solid contents are 9% for input and 50% for output. Only steam and energy demand for the evaporator are considered. 

From raw (or skimmed) milk at evaporator input. 

This activity ends with evaporated milk at the output of the evaporator.
The dataset includes the energy demand (supplied by consumption of electricity) and steam production for evaporating 1 kg of water. 
The dataset does not include waste and emissions to environment (except water from steam to air).
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of publication of the report used for data.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data used are from one European company whose equipment is used worldwide. Uncertainty is adjusted accordingly. ;Quebec specificity for steam production from natural gas is supposed.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Evaporation occurs in a 5-effect evaporator with thermal vapour recompression (TVR). ;Motor power is 75kW, and evaporation is performed with steam consumption of 1610 kg/h. Evaporator capacity is 15 ton of milk per hour. ;References : ;WESTERGAARD, V. ( 2004). Milk powder technology : evaporation and spray drying. Report for GEA Niro, Danemark. 301 p.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
Proxy dataset based on literature from milk processing equipment manufacturer. Only energy demand of the evaporator and steam production are considered. 
Infrastructure are extrapolated from the "chemical factory, organics" dataset. 
The dataset does not include waste and emissions to environment (except steam to air).

exchanges.description: Functional unit is kg of water evaporated

exchanges.description: Calculated value. All steam is supposed to be rejected to atmosphere.
Calculated value. Water input for production of the steam used in the evaporator.

exchanges.description: Proxy value for the infrastructures. Calculation based on the evaporated milk production for the removal of 1kg of water (on a basis of basic solid contents of 9% for input and 50% for output, 5,056kg of water are removed for the production of 1kg of evaporated milk) and the total production of the plant among its lifetime.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Heat for production of the steam used in the evaporator. It is assumed that steam is produced from natural gas, as it's the prevalent fuel for heat production in Quebec.
